page.title: 14BIOGRAPHY_A HEADTEACHER_
page.content: Mr.Garnham our Headmaster is about to retire after 38 years in teaching.He has spent the last 22 years as Headmaster in Tanfield Lea school.The following are some of his answers to various questions we put to him.If Mr.Garnham was not a teacher he would like to be a Geologist to study and examine rocks.He would like to study how the earth was formed.He has worked with over 100 teachers during his career.The school staff consisits of 8 non-teachers.There are 210 pupils in this school.Mr.Garnham has been teaching in 3 different schools Hebburn and shield Row_2 secondary schools and Tanfield Lea Junior school.He does not mind whether he teaches secondary or Primary schools.He spent 1 year at Hebburn,15 years at Shield Row and 22 years at Tanfield Lea school.
